dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: ...he just stepped forward, you know, to replace her. The attacker, uh, had a knife, Host_A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...he just stepped forward, you know, to replace her. The attacker, uh, had a knife, Host_A.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Musa Abdraim, who disarmed an attacker at Almaty International Airport, explained why he offered himself in place of the hostage. ... he grabbed a female security officer by the hair and threatened her with a knife.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, he volunteered to be a hostage? Like, just offered himself up? That sounds a bit... convenient.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, he volunteered to be a hostage? Like, just offered himself up? That sounds a bit... convenient.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, um, the security officer, she had a service weapon, so he, uh, didn't want anything worse to happen.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, um, the security officer, she had a service weapon, so he, uh, didn't want anything worse to happen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Abdraim said he volunteered to be taken hostage instead of the security officer, who was holding a service weapon. ... I was afraid something else might happen.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Didn't want anything worse? So, he thought he could handle it better than someone with a gun?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Didn't want anything worse? So, he thought he could handle it better than someone with a gun?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He said, um, "Take me hostage instead of her." And the attacker agreed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He said, um, Take me hostage instead of her. And the attacker agreed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: So I said, 'Take me hostage instead of her.' The attacker replied, 'Then come closer,'

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The attacker just... went along with that? Just like that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The attacker just... went along with that? Just like that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, apparently. Then, uh, he grabbed Abdraim's arm, and the woman was released.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, apparently. Then, uh, he grabbed Abdraim's arm, and the woman was released.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to him, as soon as he approached, the attacker released the woman and grabbed his arm.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the police were doing what? Drinking coffee?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the police were doing what? Drinking coffee?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, they were trying to, uh, distract the assailant, the article says.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, they were trying to, uh, distract the assailant, the article says.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Meanwhile, police officers were trying to distract the assailant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Distract him. While this guy, um, Musa, is now the hostage. Great strategy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Distract him. While this guy, um, Musa, is now the hostage. Great strategy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But then, get this, Musa watched carefully, and when the grip weakened, he just seized the knife.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then, get this, Musa watched carefully, and when the grip weakened, he just seized the knife.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I watched him carefully, and as soon as his grip weakened slightly, I had to seize the knife from his hands.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Just seized the knife"? Like it was a magic trick? No struggle? No cuts? Come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Just seized the knife? Like it was a magic trick? No struggle? No cuts? Come on.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He said, "As a man, as a citizen... I simply could not have acted differently."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He said, As a man, as a citizen... I simply could not have acted differently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a man, as a citizen of the Republic of Kazakhstan, I simply could not have acted differently,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh huh. So, a spontaneous hero, perfectly timed. Sounds like, um, a bit of a storybook ending, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh huh. So, a spontaneous hero, perfectly timed. Sounds like, um, a bit of a storybook ending, don't you think?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the President was informed and, uh, he's getting a state award for it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the President was informed and, uh, he's getting a state award for it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has been informed about the hostage situation and has instructed that the brave man who disarmed the attacker be presented with a state award.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Of course he is. Always a state award for, like, everything these days. Makes for good PR.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Of course he is. Always a state award for, like, everything these days. Makes for good P R.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But he disarmed an attacker at an airport, Host_A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he disarmed an attacker at an airport, Host_A.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Musa Abdraim, who disarmed an attacker at Almaty International Airport, explained why he offered himself in place of the hostage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: In the pre-flight security area. Where were security in the first place?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: In the pre-flight security area. Where were security in the first place?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The incident took place on March 7 in the pre-flight security check area.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He was pretending to be a passenger.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He was pretending to be a passenger.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: at approximately 11:45 AM, a disruptive man entered the domestic terminal (T1), pretending to be a passenger.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. A knife-wielding passenger, um, who grabs people by the hair. Very convincing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. A knife-wielding passenger, um, who grabs people by the hair. Very convincing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When aviation security officers asked him to present his documents, he grabbed a female security officer by the hair and threatened her with a knife.
